comments: Very good professor. Explains everything efficiently and answers any questions. Learned lots in this class, she deserves a raise. Highly recommended.
Julie is an awesome teacher. Super nice, helpful, always willing to make sure you know what is going on.

She is a great instructor and very, very, very helpful. If you suffer from test anixety or any other problems she will do what she can to help you out as long as you are putting the effort forward to get the help. I hate accounting since I am a marketing student but Julie makes it tolerable.

A great professor who will make sure you understand the material and is always willing to help. While its technically possible to not go to class except on test days its really not a good idea. Her lectures really clarify the material and are a great opportunity to get help on homework. Lots of in class example and problems to help the student.

Julie is an awesome instructor. She takes you through problems step by step until you understand the concept. She will sometimes let you have a 5 x 7 card for tests if there are alot of formulas. You do not HAVE to attend every day, but if you want to learn the material you should!
